entry.title: Desperation Mounts for Ukrainians in Mariupol as Russia Tries to Capture Key City
entry.content: The pivotal port city is cut off and residents struggle for basic needs; Moscow denies attacking the theater serving as a bomb shelter.

entry.title: How Russia's Revamped Military Fumbled the Invasion of Ukraine
entry.content: Moscow spent years and billions upgrading its capabilities, only to see the armed forces fail their first major test, confounding earlier Western assessments and giving Ukraine a boost. ‘For now, they just can’t move.’
